Name: The Guild Garage
Title: Army Restoration
Desc: The Canadian military approach The Guild to help restore a 1940s FAT field artillery tractor.
LongDescription: The Canadian military approach The Guild to help restore a 1940s FAT field artillery tractor to be used for military funerals; the army mechanics at the 2nd Regiment Royal Canadian Horse Artillery in Petawawa, Ontario work on the FAT's body.
